preqs: A HD in PHS1022 (or equivalent). Enrolment requires the School's approval.
unitName: Physics and astronomy introductory research project 1
description: Students will work with an academic supervisor on an experimental or theoretical project in an area such as: observational astronomy and astrophysics, condensed matter physics and nanotechnology, electron microscopy and diffraction, particle physics, ultra cold atomic gases, biophotonics and biomedical imaging, optics and imaging (using light, electrons and atoms), x-ray and synchrotron-based studies.
